participants.name: Lindsay Trieweiler
participants.description: Independent Distributor at SeneGence International - LipSense
participants.url: Bartender/ Server at Chili's Grill & Bar

messages.message:
Brian
You're so weird!  Were most of those recent pictures from the summer?  Did you find a new boyfriend?  That blond guy?  I saw you at Chilli's today, I am in there like 3 times a week.  I love Chilli's.  Hope to see you around hottie, thanks for adding me!

Brian
Hey sorry I haven't txted you in a while, I lost your number when I got a new phone.  How was Alaska?
well i dont have a phone anymore anyways because im in italy for the semester. alaska was phenominal and i cant wait to go back in december. hows nau?

Brian
Pretty boring still, living off campus now.  Having more parties and more fun then ever.  A semester in Italy sounds awesome, keep me updated.
